column1: wim-rust-18916b12,Wim,Rust,"Founder Fakton, Developer of well known financial systems and trainer in many  real estate education  courses",https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C5603AQFapv7X8-nAGQ/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1517781451479?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=Ccgl4xjuU-Gg811MhBFS3x7IBwPMU0VaNWVtHeZ2cmQ,,personal,ACoAAAKD3TkBKYY4qsaY4C8H8P83i6w77PooIS4,42196281,,"In 2005 Wim Rust founder of Fakton, partly retired, but is still active for them as a senior advisor.
Currently (2019) he develops a financial scheme to make the energy transition profitable for tenants and is an active landdeveloper
Well-known and creative authority in the field of real estate: analyzing, optimizing, financing .and lecturing. He dislikes extensive reports and is famous for his “egg of Columbus” solutions
•Developed and introduced  new mortgage systems, land lease and new valuation techniques in the Netherlands. The ""spaar hypotheek"" and the first ""starters lening"" were some of his famous products

column2: Multibillion Key projects as Zuid-as (Amsterdam), Central Stations Rotterdam, and  Utrecht
Urban revitalizing area’s in the 4 big cities
Several VINEX )  locations and numerous smaller projects
Design real estate models for banks, pension funds, municipalities / government, NVM
Urban planning restructuring in Ljubljana Slovenia
Urban economic advisor new Master plan city of Perm (Russia)
Montenegro: Feasibility and financing Jaz Hill Resorts
Advisor social housing and mortgage systems Lombard (Italy), Rumania and Slovakia
Internal sparring partner for Fakton foreign projects (Belgium, Denmark, Luxemburg)
Author of books: “Vastgoed financieel” and “Financiele vraagstukken vastgoed”
Key speaker at many seminars and author of many  talked-about articles and columns in professional magazines
Lectured at many real estate studies, post university graduate training, University of Amsterdam/ Delft, Antwerp and other educational institutions
Key lecturer at in-company trainings for, among others
Dutch Association of Real Estate Developers (NEPROM)
large investments companies like ING, BPF, ABP, RABO/Bouwfonds and Amvest.
municipalities, central governments and housing corporations.
ING international (Poland, Prague, Budapest, Frankfurt, London, Paris, Madrid)
